plays.text: Penalty to Patrick Traverse 2 minutes for Crosschecking Jeff Daniels
Penalty to Marcel Hossa 2 minutes for High Sticking Bret Hedican
Penalty to Bates Battaglia 2 minutes for Tripping Craig Rivet
Penalty to Shaun Van Allen 2 minutes for Interference Darren Langdon
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Josef Vasicek
Penalty to Aaron Ward 2 minutes for Hooking Oleg Petrov
Penalty to Richard Zednik 2 minutes for Holding Bret Hedican
Penalty to Josef Vasicek 2 minutes for Interference Richard Zednik
Goal scored by Richard Zednik assisted by Oleg Petrov
Goal scored by Sami Kapanen assisted by Ron Francis and Bates Battaglia
